DOC.criteria: 18 year age old diagnosis Diagnosed first primary colorectal cancer ( stage IIII ) Completed last treatment colorectal cancer ( surgery , chemotherapy , radiation ) least 6 month 2 year date study enrollment Able speak English , questionnaire available English Able provide inform consent Received treatment colorectal cancer MSKCC QCC , surgical treatment outside facility , treatment ( chemotherapy radiation ) MSKCC QCC Undergoing active treatment colorectal cancer Diagnosed metastatic colorectal cancer Prior history colorectal cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) Diagnosed new recurrent colorectal cancer primary colorectal cancer diagnosis Received survivorship care plan treat institution
